articles.author: Paige Lavender
articles.title: Joe Manchin Defeats Patrick Morrisey In West Virginia Senate Race
articles.description: The Democratic senator triumphed in the deep red state despite the attorney general support from Donald Trump and big ties to the pharmaceutical industry.
articles.content: Sen. Joe Manchin (D) was declared the winner of the U.S. Senate race in West Virginia, defeating Republican Patrick Morrisey. Morrisey, the state’s attorney general, trailed in the polls leading up to Election Day but was still considered a threat to Manchin,… [+2063 chars]

articles.author: Sam Levine
articles.title: In Historic Move, Fla. Approves Automatically Restoring Voting Rights To Felons
articles.description: The move, reversing a Jim Crow-era policy, is one of the most significant expansions of the franchise in modern times.

articles.author: Nick Visser
articles.title: Republican Marsha Blackburn Wins Tennessee Senate Seat
articles.description: Blackburn portrayed herself as a conservative firebrand closely aligned with President Donald Trump.

articles.title: Tammy Baldwin Wins Re-election As Wisconsin Senator

articles.title: Kim Davis (Yes, That Kim Davis) Just Lost Her Re-election Bid To A Democrat
